cpl.readme:
!!!Basic Configuration
This plugin enables ckeditor to be used in a tiddlywiki. For the Ckeditor license see http://ckeditor.com/about/license

ckeditor can be used directly from the web, eg http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/ckeditor/4.3.2/ckeditor.js
or can be obtained directly from http://ckeditor.com/download

Note that this plugin is designed to work with the ckeditor standard packages (but can be configured for custom packages).

The tiddler $:/plugin/bj/visualeditor/includelib

needs to contain the location of the ckeditor library. The default is

```
http://127.0.0.1/libs/ckeditor/ckeditor.js
```
change to your location. Note that this can be an online location eg

```
http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/ckeditor/4.3.2/ckeditor.js

```

!!!Advanced configuration
Configuration options as described on the ckeditor website can be set in the tiddler 
$:/plugins/bj/visualeditor/config.json
User styles (also described on the ckeditor website) are included in the tiddler 
$:/plugins/bj/visualeditor/styles.json
cpl.title: $:/plugins/bj/visualeditor
cpl.author: JeffreyWilkinson
